title: Example Blog Post Title: How to Create Engaging Content
description: This is an example blog post showing the JSON structure and available content types.

content.content: This is a regular paragraph. You can include highlighted words by adding them to the highlights array.
Here's another paragraph with multiple highlighted terms to show how the highlighting system works.

content: First list item with some highlighted text
Third list item with more highlights

content.content: This is a tip box. Use this for helpful tips, quick fixes, or important advice that stands out from regular content.
This is an example box. Use this to show examples, case studies, or detailed explanations that need special formatting.
This is a warning box. Use this for calls-to-action, important warnings, or promotional content.
This is a blockquote. Use this for quotes, testimonials, or important statements that should stand out.
